episodes.title: Solas
episodes.synopsis: Mouth, Echo and Sharp Locke – identical triplets who call themselves "Master Thieves" – are hired to steal an object from The Miscellany in the city of Avidity. They soon found out what they've stolen is more trouble than they bargained for.
episodes.quote:
Do not be mad,
You shouldn’t be sad.
Do not pursue,
We’re smarter than you.


Please don’t sob,
You’ve only been robbed,
Much to your shock,
By the Brothers Locke.
episodes.quoteLabel: - a courtesy note left by The Brothers Locke

episodes.title: Dangerous Burdens
episodes.synopsis: With few options left, Solas and The Brothers Locke must escape the dangers of Black Harvester Forest. Meanwhile, Sim Sam has sent an unsuspecting security officer on a deadly mission.
episodes.quote: “I’ll tell you this, when people have expectations of you because of things other people told them or what they want to believe you are, it’s a burden. A dangerous burden. Some people look to you and see someone who can fix all their problems, and that’s a bad thing. Others look at you and see someone who is a threat.”

episodes.title: The Gold of Captain Horsefly
episodes.synopsis: The Crimson Corsairs capture Solas and decide that a trio of Master Thieves are just what they need to find their lost gold.
episodes.quote: “The Miscellany would likely try to charge me a hefty fee for it. That’s what he does. He negotiates. He politics. He looks for advantages to gain over you. No, I’m not letting my gold go. It’s mine and I want it back”

episodes.title: You Get Soft, You Get Killed
episodes.synopsis: Finally away from the dangers of the East, Solas and The Brothers Locke head to Pharracrop to get answers and payment for their work.
episodes.quote: “Maybe it’s because I’m not burdened with all that visual noise, or that I’m useless in a fight, or maybe it’s just how I was wired. Who knows? I do think I’m able to handle things better than my brothers, that’s for certain.”

episodes.title: Old Dreams, New Nightmares
episodes.synopsis: Mouth dreams about his childhood in a home that wasn't happy. Sim Sam's plans start to take shape.
episodes.quote: “The path for the believers, those who know the children are sacred, rests not above the frozen skin of the land, nor in the turbulent winds of the sky, but in the veins of The Dea itself. A debt must be paid to the Ostiary with the Gold of Odum in order to pass the gates and onto the heart of The Spire itself.”
episodes.quoteLabel: - Quote from the text of Icagoro's Shamans

episodes.title: A Heel Among Us
episodes.synopsis: The team is rocked by stunning revelations about the treasures they've acquired and also the teammates they've worked with.
episodes.quote: “They say most of the wars between the East and West are sparked by the arrival of these Children. It’s against the law nearly everywhere to bring one into the Dea, but somehow, someway, folks keep doing it.”

episodes.title: Cacoethes
episodes.synopsis: Bulk Brown finds himself at the mercy of the elements and needing the teenagers to rescue him. Bando and Dana confront their individual and collective histories on their way to The Spire.
episodes.quote: “The boy was touched, shall we say, by powers more divine than either of us. They say when a man is touched by divinity, only a fool would question it or his loyalty to it. That’s a mistake his prior companions made, and I saw as an opportunity.”

episodes.title: Children of the Spire
episodes.synopsis: All paths cross in the finale where loyalty, faith, friendship, and brotherhood are all tested in one last reveal that will have consequences for years to come to the entire Dea.
